name: Chris Bevan
content: Chris Bevan I'm a mixed-methods HCI specialist producing human-centred, cross-disciplinary R&D with partners from academia, industry and the creative sector. I produce award winning research on a range of topics including virtual reality, pervasive computing, social robotics & cybersecurity. I collaborate with many amazing people and institutions including University of the West of England, Pacific Northwest National Laboratory, University of Dundee, University of Bristol, VR City, 	Jongsma and O'Neill & Watershed. I teach immersive technologies as part of the Bristol Interaction Group at the University of Bristol's school of Computer Science.
